description: Fully custom website built for a client using the latest technology. The site was designed from the ground up using design resources such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe XD, and Figma in order to generate a desireable mock up and then created on the Gatsby.js platform for speed and reliability
Full Stack application with a Django back-end and a React.js front end. This was a collaboration project in a team of 8 engineers working together in an Agile environment
Web version of the popular Hasbro game Simon. The objective was to use the React.js library to configure a fully functional version of the game and its logic by using most of React's features.
Full stack e-commerce application built on the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)

SEO optimized and fully responsive web page for my personal portfolio designed with Adobe XD, Adobe Photoshop, Figma for the design phase and built on the Gatsby.js platform for speed and reliability.
